entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 16 March 2023
